Living Link Lab

Human-Building Research at the UVa Link Lab

Get Started

Human, Building, and Research

The Living Link Lab is a research platform that aims to promote sustainability and wellness practices by enabling naturalistic in-situ studies of occupant behavior, cognition, and interactions in a large collaborative environment.
